text: Scott Gottlieb is an American physician. Gottlieb was commissioner of the Food and Drug Administration from 2017 to 2019.Thomas, Katie, "F.D.A. Official Under Bush Is Said to Be Trumpâ€™s Choice to Lead Agency", New York Times, March 10, 2017. Retrieved 2017-03-10.Cunningham, Paige Winfield, "Trump expected to pick Scott Gottlieb to head FDA", Washington Examiner, March 10, 2017. Retrieved 2017-03-10. Gottlieb was a clinical assistant professor at New York University School of Medicine, a resident fellow at the conservative think tank the American Enterprise Institute, and an internist at Tisch Hospital. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Academics from New York (state) Category:American physicians Category:Commissioners of the Food and Drug Administration Category:Scientists from New York (state) Category:Politicians from New York (state) Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Scott Gottlieb
